com.horse.pokemon.AnimationEngine

Class AnimationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.horse.pokemon.AnimationEngine.AnimationHelper

  • public class AnimationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that makes animations easier and more efficient. A three-dimensional array is used to store all the information for one spritesheet. The first part of the array is for distinguishing the type of action the sprite is performing. The second part of the array is each frame of the specific action. The last part of the array is the actual information of the positioning of the frame, which is made up of primitive ints.
    See Also:
    Annotation, ArrayList, TextureRegion, Animation, Class
